author: Valerie Bauerlein
title: Site Where GOP Train Crashed Was Notoriously Tricky, Locals Say
text:
The fatal crash involving an Amtrak train carrying Republican members of Congress and a garbage truck occurred at a notoriously tricky crossing just outside a fast-growing suburb of Charlottesville, Va.
“I hate the crossing,” said Rich Predmore, a retiree who lives a few hundred yards away in the Grayrock neighborhood. On one side of the intersection is a steep incline, and on the other, a sharp turn, which he said makes the crossing difficult to navigate.
